title: Google\Cloud\Build\V1\SourceProvenance
name: SourceProvenance
description:
Provenance of the source. Ways to find the original source, or verify that some source was used for this build.

Generated from protobuf message google.devtools.cloudbuild.v1.SourceProvenance

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.resolved_storage_source
params.description: A copy of the build's source.storage_source, if exists, with any generations resolved.

params.name: data.resolved_repo_source
params.description: A copy of the build's source.repo_source, if exists, with any revisions resolved.

params.name: data.resolved_storage_source_manifest
params.description: A copy of the build's source.storage_source_manifest, if exists, with any revisions resolved. This feature is in Preview.

params.name: data.file_hashes
params.description: Output only. Hash(es) of the build source, which can be used to verify that the original source integrity was maintained in the build. Note that FileHashes will only be populated if BuildOptions has requested a SourceProvenanceHash. The keys to this map are file paths used as build source and the values contain the hash values for those files. If the build source came in a single package such as a gzipped tarfile (.tar.gz), the FileHash will be for the single path to that file.

This feature is in Preview.

methods.name: getFileHashes
methods.description:
Output only. Hash(es) of the build source, which can be used to verify that the original source integrity was maintained in the build. Note that FileHashes will only be populated if BuildOptions has requested a SourceProvenanceHash.

The keys to this map are file paths used as build source and the values contain the hash values for those files. If the build source came in a single package such as a gzipped tarfile (.tar.gz), the FileHash will be for the single path to that file.

Generated from protobuf field map<string, .google.devtools.cloudbuild.v1.FileHashes> file_hashes = 4 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OUTPUT_ONLY];

methods.description:

The keys to this map are file paths used as build source and the values contain the hash values for those files. If the build source came in a single package such as a gzipped tarfile (.tar.gz), the FileHash will be for the single path to that file.

Generated from protobuf field map<string, .google.devtools.cloudbuild.v1.FileHashes> file_hashes = 4 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = OUTPUT_ONLY];

params.name: var
params.description:
Output only. Hash(es) of the build source, which can be used to verify that the original source integrity was maintained in the build. Note that FileHashes will only be populated if BuildOptions has requested a SourceProvenanceHash.

The keys to this map are file paths used as build source and the values contain the hash values for those files. If the build source came in a single package such as a gzipped tarfile (.tar.gz), the FileHash will be for the single path to that file.
